vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σωφρον-ισμός, ὁ,
teaching of morality or moderation, [Refs 1st c.BC+]; self-control, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: self-discipline, with an implication that this discipline demonstrates prudence and wisdom
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
self-discipline, with an implication that this discipline demonstrates prudence and wisdom
self discipline, prudence, wisdom 2Tim. 1:7*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sano juicio, buen juicio; dominio propio
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 自制, 節制, 慎思明辨 (提後1:7)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 自制, 节制, 慎思明辨 (提后1:7)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tự chủ; bình tĩnh. // Xem G4994
